text.*:
This article needs more links to other articles to help integrate it into the encyclopedia. Please help improve this article by adding links that are relevant to the context within the existing text. (September 2018) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

The Best Chinese Universities Ranking (BCUR) is a ranking table of Chinese institutions of higher education.[1] It is compiled by Shanghai Ruanke, the same agency that is behind the Academic Ranking of World Universities (ARWU).

References[edit]

  1. ^ Best Chinese Universities Ranking – About

External links[edit]

  • http://www.shanghairanking.com/Chinese_Universities_Rankings/Overall-Ranking-2018.html
